message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.CV 

This paper is about training neural networks to learn to follow instructions, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.CL and cs.AI are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of neural networks, which falls under the category of machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL), making cs.LG a likely sub-category as well. The task of following instructions can also be related to robotics and control, making cs.RO a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions the use of visual inputs, which can be related to computer vision, making cs.CV a possible sub-category.
